data.name: ContentTitle
data.value: Welcome to the "Methodological support of disciplines" system

data.name: EndSubtitle
data.value: Sincerely, the Development Team of this site

data.name: GenericInformation
data.value: This site is designed to automate the management of teaching materials (textbooks, files, websites) by teachers, monitor their progress, interactions between teachers and students, and maintain the results of ongoing monitoring.

data.name: HelpInformation
data.value: If you have any questions about training or the system's operation, please contact the developers at saibl.og203@gmail.com.

data.name: ExceptionRoleString
data.value: Role identification error. You may be logged in to a test account or the system has failed.

data.name: AdminMainString
data.value: This role is intended for the overall management of all system processes. You have access to managing users, deleting them, and can send them requests to change their data if you find faults in the table. Also, you have access to managing course groups, their formalization, and access to all the training materials that teachers provide to students.

data.name: GuestMainString
data.value: You have the role of a guest, and to use the system further, you need to wait until the administrator gives you another role - student or teacher.
